structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
GENERAL PROVISIONS APPLICABLE TO COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Effect of KRS 65.805 to 65.830 on special districts created prior to July 13, 1984.
law.text: The amendment or repeal by 1984 Acts, Chapter 64 of a section authorizing the creation of a district shall not be construed as limiting or changing the power or organization of districts created prior to July 13, 1984.
law.history: Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 64, sec. 6, effective July 13, 1984.
